Pre-Game Insights: Cape Verde topped Group B despite the presence of multiple-time winners Egypt and Ghana
Mauritania stunned 2019 champions Algeria to secure passage to this stage for the first time in the nation's history
Others: Cape Verde seek to match their best Africa Cup of Nations showing when they face Mauritania
Mauritania have never played a knockout game at the continental showpiece but booked their spot with a stunning 1-0 triumph over Algeria in their final group game
